text.author: Wiktionary
text.title: school
text.summary: This dictionary entry for the word 'school' gives its pronunciation /skuːl/, etymologies for its senses a group/to form a group of fish (from Middle English scole, Proto-Germanic *skulō 'crowd') and elementary school/to educate (from Proto-Germanic *skōla, from Late Latin schola, Ancient Greek σχολεῖον), along with cognates and usage examples as both noun and verb.
